mapper.select: select EVIDENCE_ID, CASE_ID, CONSIGNMENT_ID, EVIDENCE_NO, EVIDENCE_NAME, EVIDENCE_TYPE, EVIDENCE_COUNT, EVIDENCE_UNIT, EVIDENCE_PACKING, EVIDENCE_TRAITS, EVIDENCE_DESC, CREATE_DATETIME, CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_PERSON, DELETE_FLAG, DELETE_DATETIME, DELETE_PERSON, DELETE_REASON, EVIDENCE_REMARK from LIMS_EVIDENCE_INFO where EVIDENCE_ID = #{evidenceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
